summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1429, for the improvement of 28th Avenue from East Spruce Street to East Cherry Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle by constructing sewers therein with necessary manholes, wyes and other appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 15525 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
